data.text: @m1nd1 ...might have died because of the fear-mongering if had we not all but forced her to go to the hospital by ambulance.  She had double pneumonia & spent a month in the hospital...part of it in MICU.

@m1nd1 You know what else makes my blood boil? These folks who spread bull crap about hospitals in how they handle covid patients, causing people who are sick to fear seeking very necessary treatment that hospitals provide! My daughter-in-law...1/2

@m1nd1 I've had my Covid Omnicron suffering since first week of January. I was deathly ill. Now, today, I am still suffering my symptoms. My brain pains move from left to right. My left leg twitches still, etc. I wanted to write: I empathize with you. I wish you comfort & recovery. 🎰🌹
@m1nd1 Oh, Mindi. My heart cries for you. I understand the bitterness of having a pill case to fill weekly because of a chronic illness. I'm so sorry, honey. 😥
@m1nd1 That stinks. I'm so sorry and sorry people suck. #hugs
@m1nd1 Health and wholeness to you. Deep peace.

@m1nd1 I’m sorry Mindi. This is pretty consistent with my dad’s covid experience. For some reason many people lack the ability to understand that THEIR experience isn’t everyone’s. So since it was no big deal for them then it’s no big deal, period. I will be praying for rapid recovery.
@m1nd1 I’m so sorry. I have a chronic illness and I sometimes have this exact same response when I refill my pill separator. I hope this eases up for you one day, and for what it’s worth, I see you.
